# Problem 11.24 - By Superposition {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A simply supported beam is loaded as shown where L = 2 m, w<sub>1</sub> = 2 kN/m, and w<sub>2</sub> = 3 kN/m. Determine the magnitude of the deflection at the center of the beam. Assume EI = 30,000 kN-m<sup>2</sup>.
